Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by presenting a photo of a bridge in the US state of Florida as the proposed mega bridge in the Philippines.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo is not of the proposed mega bridge in the Philippines, but of the Sunshine Skyway Bridge in Florida.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the photo is indeed of the proposed mega bridge in the Philippines.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo is of the proposed mega bridge in the Philippines without verifying its authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim can have an alternative explanation that the misleading post was created to generate excitement among social media users without providing accurate information.
